title: When you get Bard 3 times in a row on ARAM . . .

replies.body:
I can't tell if that's a face of rage or relief 

:/)
that gif would be really hot if he were thinner
I think he's hot the way he is. <3
Does Bard's E even do anything on ARAM? I really don't think theres a single wall he can actually make a portal through on that map.

If you aim it right, you can make a portal through nearly the entire way to the middle of the bridge from where it expands, but that's basically it. Aiming it right can PROBABLY make a great way to escape too, but beyond that, yeah. It's useless. Still fun though!

actually, if you portal the enemy turret, you can usually get them to start playing with the portal, not realizing it's crowding them together for skill shot champs on your team (like blitz and his grab for instance) to land their shots. it's not useful in it's traditional sense, but you can figure out neat tricks to work against the other team.

Yeah but sometimes you end up baiting your own team instead.
Not that I am speaking from personal experience or anything.
It's a feeling g I enjoy.
